original_title: Two including Ven. Ulapane Sumangala Thero remanded
original_body_lines: The convenor of the Teacher-Principal Trade Union Alliance, Ven. Ulapane Sumangala Thero, and another person have been remanded until April 26.
This order has been issued by the Hulftsdorp Magistrate’s Court for their attempted disturbance against implementing a court order, Ada Derana reporter said.
